GR14mdhvkmou:2: arcitaḥ saṃsmṛto dhyātaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ śrutaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:3: yo dadāty amṛtatvaṃ hi sa māṃ rakṣatu keśavaḥ. // MKm_1 //
GR14mdhvkmou:4: tāpatrayeṇa saṃtaptaṃ yad etad akhilaṃ jagat
GR14mdhvkmou:5: vakṣyāmi śāntaye hy asya kṛṣṇāmṛtamahārṇavam. // MKm_2 //
GR14mdhvkmou:6: te narāḥ paśavo loke kiṃ teṣāṃ jīvane phalam
GR14mdhvkmou:7: yair na labdhā harer dīkṣā nārcito vā janārdanaḥ. // MKm_3 //
GR14mdhvkmou:9: ayam eko mahābhāgaḥ pūjyate yad adhokṣajaḥ. // MKm_4 //
GR14mdhvkmou:10: sa nāma sukṛtī loke kulaṃ tena hy alaṃkṛtam
GR14mdhvkmou:11: ādhāraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yena viṣṇuḥ prasāditaḥ. // MKm_5 //
GR14mdhvkmou:12: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:15: ye 'rcayanti narā nityaṃ te 'pi vandyā yathā hariḥ. // MKm_7 //
GR14mdhvkmou:16: nāsti śreyaskaraṃ nṛṇāṃ viṣṇor ārādhanān mune
GR14mdhvkmou:17: yuge 'smiṃs tāmase loke satataṃ pūjyate nṛbhiḥ. // MKm_8 //
GR14mdhvkmou:19: arcitāḥ sarvadevāḥ syur yataḥ sarvagato hariḥ. // MKm_9 //
GR14mdhvkmou:21: keśave kaṃsakeśighne na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ. // MKm_10 //
GR14mdhvkmou:23: muktibhāgī nirātaṅkī viṣṇuloke ciraṃ vaset. // MKm_11 //
GR14mdhvkmou:25: sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat surair api durlabham. // MKm_12 //
GR14mdhvkmou:28: sākṣād bhagavato viṣṇoḥ pūjanaṃ janmanaḥ phalam. // MKm_13 //
GR14mdhvkmou:31: harir dadāti hi phalaṃ sarvayajñaiś ca durlabham. // MKm_14 //
GR14mdhvkmou:33: phalaṃ dadāti sulabhaṃ salilenāpi pūjitaḥ. // MKm_15 //
GR14mdhvkmou:35: kiṃ tvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ. // MKm_16 //
GR14mdhvkmou:38: smaraṇān muktido nṛṇāṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ. // MKm_17 //
GR14mdhvkmou:39: dravyāṇām apy abhāve tu salilenāpi pūjitaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:40: yo dadāti svakaṃ sthānaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ. // MKm_18 //
GR14mdhvkmou:42: na prāptā yair harer dīkṣā sarvaduḥkhavimocanī. // MKm_19 //
GR14mdhvkmou:45: yat kṛtaṃ tatkṛtaṃ tena samprāptaṃ paramaṃ padam. // MKm_20 //
GR14mdhvkmou:49: praṇāmaṃ ye 'pi kurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ. // MKm_22 //
GR14mdhvkmou:52: na hi samprāpyate śreṣṭhaṃ tasmād ārādhayācyutam. // MKm_23 //
GR14mdhvkmou:54: paraḥ parāṇāṃ puruṣas tuṣṭo yasya janārdanaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:55: sa cā 'pnoty akṣayaṃ sthānam etat satyaṃ mayoditam. // MKm_24 //
GR14mdhvkmou:58: tam ārādhaya govindaṃ sthānam agryaṃ yadīcchasi. // MKm_25 //
GR14mdhvkmou:60: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma yo 'sau brahma sanātanam
GR14mdhvkmou:61: tam ārādhya hariṃ yāti muktim apy atidurlabhām. // MKm_26 //
GR14mdhvkmou:62: aindram indraḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ yam ārādhya jagatpatim
GR14mdhvkmou:63: prāpa yajñapatiṃ viṣṇuṃ tam ārādhaya suvrata. // MKm_27 //
GR14mdhvkmou:64: prāpnoty ārādhite viṣṇau manasā yad yad icchati
GR14mdhvkmou:67: sarvapāpavinirmuktāḥ paraṃ brahma viśanti te. // MKm_29 //
GR14mdhvkmou:68: tato 'niruddhaṃ deveśaṃ pradyumnaṃ ca tataḥ param
GR14mdhvkmou:69: tataḥ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devaṃ vāsudevaṃ parāt param. // MKm_30 //
GR14mdhvkmou:71: vāsudevaṃ praviṣṭānāṃ punar āvartanaṃ kutaḥ. // MKm_31 //
GR14mdhvkmou:73: yo yān icchen naraḥ kāmān nārī vā varavarṇinī
GR14mdhvkmou:74: tān samāpnoti vipulān samārādhya janārdhanam. // MKm_32 //
GR14mdhvkmou:77: bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tartuṃ ka iccheta pumān bhuvi
GR14mdhvkmou:78: vāsudevam anārādhya ko mokṣaṃ gantum icchati. // MKm_33 //
GR14mdhvkmou:80: kṛte pāpe 'nutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate
GR14mdhvkmou:81: prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyoktaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ param. // MKm_34 //
GR14mdhvkmou:82: na hy apuṇyavatāṃ loke mūḍhānāṃ kuṭilātmanāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:83: bhaktir bhavati govinde smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā. // MKm_35 //
GR14mdhvkmou:85: jitendriyo viśuddhātmā yadaiva smarate harim. // MKm_36 //
GR14mdhvkmou:87: na kaścit smarate devaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kalimalāpaham. // MKm_37 //
GR14mdhvkmou:89: karoti martyo mūḍhātmā smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ hareḥ. // MKm_38 //
GR14mdhvkmou:91: te prayānti bhavaṃ tyaktvā viṣṇulokam anāmayam. // MKm_39 //
GR14mdhvkmou:93: na bādhyate naro nityaṃ vāsudevam anusmaran. // MKm_40 //
GR14mdhvkmou:95: svapne 'pi ca na paśyeta yaḥ smared garuḍadhvajam. // MKm_41 //
GR14mdhvkmou:96: hṛdi rūpaṃ mukhe nāma naivedyam udare hareḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:97: pādodakaṃ ca nirmālyaṃ mastake yasya so 'cyutaḥ. // MKm_42 //
GR14mdhvkmou:99: asaṃśayaṃ dahaty āśu tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ. // MKm_43 //
GR14mdhvkmou:102: śatadhā bhedam āyāti girir vajrahato tathā. // MKm_44 //
GR14mdhvkmou:103: kṛṣṇe ratāḥ kṛṣṇam anusmarantaḥ tad bhāvitās tad gatamānasāś ca.
GR14mdhvkmou:104: te bhinnadehāḥ praviśanti viṣṇuṃ havir yathā mantrahutaṃ hutāśe. // MKm_45 //
GR14mdhvkmou:105: sā hānis tan mahat chidraṃ sā cāndhajaḍamūkatā
GR14mdhvkmou:106: yan muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vā 'pi vāsudevo na cintyate. // MKm_46 //
GR14mdhvkmou:107: nārāyaṇo nāma naro narāṇāṃ prasaṃhya coraḥ kathitaḥ pṛthivyām
GR14mdhvkmou:110: koṭijanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ takṣaṇād eva naśyati. // MKm_48 //
GR14mdhvkmou:111: kiṃ tasya bahubhis tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:112: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam ananyadhīḥ. // MKm_49 //
GR14mdhvkmou:113: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti
GR14mdhvkmou:114: dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti. // MKm_50 //
GR14mdhvkmou:115: he citta cintaya sveha vāsudevam aharniśam
GR14mdhvkmou:116: nūnaṃ yaś cintitaḥ puṃsāṃ hanti saṃsārabandhanam. // MKm_51 //
GR14mdhvkmou:117: āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:118: idam ekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ sadā. // MKm_52 //
GR14mdhvkmou:120: puruṣas tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim. // MKm_53 //
GR14mdhvkmou:121: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapasu caiva dāneṣu tīrtheṣu vrateṣu caiva
GR14mdhvkmou:122: iṣṭeṣu pūrteṣu ca yat pradiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ smṛte tat khalu vāsudeve. // MKm_54 //
GR14mdhvkmou:124: ārādhayaiva naro viṣṇuṃ manaso yad yad icchati
GR14mdhvkmou:125: phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ bhūri svalpam athāpi vā. // MKm_55 //
GR14mdhvkmou:129: prayāti vilayaṃ sadyaḥ sakṛt saṃkīrtite 'cyute. // MKm_57 //
GR14mdhvkmou:133: na pumān keśavād anyaḥ sarvapāpacikitsakaḥ. // MKm_59 //
GR14mdhvkmou:134: yad abhyarcya hariṃ bhaktyā kṛte varṣaśatair api
GR14mdhvkmou:135: phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ kalau saṃkīrtya keśavam. // MKm_60 //
GR14mdhvkmou:136: kṣīyate tu yadā dharmaḥ prāpte ghore kalau yuge
GR14mdhvkmou:137: tadā na kīrtayet kaścin muktidaṃ devam acyutam. // MKm_61 //
GR14mdhvkmou:139: pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrastamṛgair iva. // MKm_62 //
GR14mdhvkmou:141: tathā 'pi narake ghore majjantīty etad adbhutam. // MKm_63 //
GR14mdhvkmou:142: ārtā viṣaṇṇāḥ śithilāś ca bhītā ghoreṣu ca vyādhiṣu vartamānāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:143: saṃkīrtya nārāyaṅaśabdamātraṃ vimuktaduḥkhāḥ sukhino bhavanti. // MKm_64 //
GR14mdhvkmou:145: sakṛd uccāritaṃ yais tu kṛṣṇeti na viśanti te
GR14mdhvkmou:146: garbhāgāraṃ gṛhaṃ mātur yamalokaṃ ca dussaham. // MKm_65 //
GR14mdhvkmou:148: kva japo vāsudeveti muktibījam anuttamam. // MKm_66 //
GR14mdhvkmou:149: buddhyā buddhvā vadasvainaṃ harir ity akṣaradvayam
GR14mdhvkmou:150: smaraṇād eva kṛṣṇasya na punarjāyate kvacit. // MKm_67 //
GR14mdhvkmou:151: he jihve mama nisnehe hariṃ kiṃ nuna bhāṣase
GR14mdhvkmou:152: hariṃ vadasva kalyāṇi saṃsārodadhinaur hariḥ. // MKm_68 //
GR14mdhvkmou:153: asāre khalu saṃsāre sārāt sārataro hariḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:154: puṇyahīnā na vindanti sāraṅgāś ca yathā jalam. // MKm_69 //
GR14mdhvkmou:155: kurukṣetreṇa kiṃ tasya kiṃ kāśyā puṣkareṇa vā
GR14mdhvkmou:156: jihvāgre vartate tasya harir ity akṣaradvayam. // MKm_70 //
GR14mdhvkmou:158: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram ekaṃ nirūpitam
GR14mdhvkmou:160: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti tac cittaṃ yat tadarpaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:161: tāv eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau. // MKm_72 //
GR14mdhvkmou:162: yas tu viṣṇuparo nityaṃ dṛḍhabhaktir jitendriyaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:163: svagṛhe 'pi vasan yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam. // MKm_73 //
GR14mdhvkmou:166: yan māṃ pṛcchasi dharmajña keśavārādhanaṃ prati. // MKm_74 //
GR14mdhvkmou:167: nimiṣaṃ nimiṣārdhaṃ vā muhūrtam api bhārgava
GR14mdhvkmou:169: kiṃ tena manasā kāryaṃ yan na tiṣṭhati keśave
GR14mdhvkmou:171: rogo nāma na sā jihvā yayā na stūyate hariḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:172: gartau nāma na tau karṇau yābhyāṃ tat karma na śrutam. // MKm_77 //
GR14mdhvkmou:174: rogo nāma na sā jihvā yā na vakti harer guṇān. // MKm_78 //
GR14mdhvkmou:175: bhārabhūtaiḥ kāryam ebhiḥ kiṃ tasya nṛpaśor dvija
GR14mdhvkmou:177: te ca netre mahābhāga yābhyāṃ sandṛśyate hariḥ. // MKm_79 //
GR14mdhvkmou:178: kiṃ tasya caraṇaiḥ kāryaṃ vṛthāsañcaraṇair dvija
GR14mdhvkmou:179: yair hi na vrajate jantuḥ keśavālayadarśane. // MKm_80 //
GR14mdhvkmou:181: ṛṣitvam api dharmajña vijñeyaṃ tatprasādajam. // MKm_81 //
GR14mdhvkmou:185: nāsau tat phalam āpnoti tadbhaktair yad avāpyate. // MKm_83 //
GR14mdhvkmou:186: re re manuṣyāḥ puruṣottamasya karau na kasmān mukulīkurudhve
GR14mdhvkmou:187: kriyājuṣāṃ ko bhavatāṃ prayāsaḥ phalaṃ hi yat padam acyutasya. // MKm_84 //
GR14mdhvkmou:188: viṣṇor vimānaṃ yaḥ kuryāt sakṛd bhaktyā pradakṣiṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:190: pradakṣiṇaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād haribhaktyā samanvitaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:194: urasā śirasā dṛṣṭyā manasā vacasā tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:195: padbhyāṃ karābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga īritaḥ. // MKm_88 //
GR14mdhvkmou:197: śātajanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ naśyaty eva na saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_89 //
GR14mdhvkmou:199: nānyo dharttā jagannāthaṃ muktvā nārāyaṇaṃ param. // MKm_90 //
GR14mdhvkmou:203: anyadevasya naivedyaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret. // MKm_92 //
GR14mdhvkmou:205: yat phalaṃ labhyate pumbhir viṣṇor naivedya bhakṣaṇāt. // MKm_93 //
GR14mdhvkmou:207: samudragās tu pakṣasya māsasya saritāṃ patiḥ. // MKm_94 //
GR14mdhvkmou:211: kālena tīrthasalilāni punanti pāpaṃ pādodakaṃ bhagavataḥ prapunāti sadyaḥ. // MKm_96 //
GR14mdhvkmou:212: yāni kāni ca tīrthāni brahmāṇḍāntargatāni vai
GR14mdhvkmou:214: snānaṃ pādodakaṃ viṣṇoḥ piban śirasi dhārayan
GR14mdhvkmou:215: sarva pāpavinirmukto vaiṣṇavīṃ siddhim āpnuyāt. // MKm_98 //
GR14mdhvkmou:217: naivedyaṃ dhūpaśeṣaṃ ca ārārttiś ca tathā hareḥ. // MKm_99 //
GR14mdhvkmou:218: tulasyās tu rajojuṣṭaṃ naivedyasya ca bhakṣaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:220: bhaktyā vā yadi vā 'bhaktyā cakrāṅkitaśilām prati
GR14mdhvkmou:225: yojanāni tathā trīṇi mama kṣetraṃ vasundhare. // MKm_103 //
GR14mdhvkmou:227: yatrāpi nīyate tatra vāraṇasyā śatādhikam. // MKm_104 //
GR14mdhvkmou:229: ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktir na saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_105 //
GR14mdhvkmou:231: sa yasya sarvabhāveṣu tasya taiḥ kiṃ prayojanam. // MKm_106 //
GR14mdhvkmou:232: harir yāti harir yāti dasyuvyājena yo vadet
GR14mdhvkmou:233: so 'pi sadgatim āpnoti gatiṃ sukṛtino yathā. // MKm_107 //
GR14mdhvkmou:235: tyaktvā 'mṛtaṃ sa mūḍhātmā bhuṅkte hālāhalaṃ viṣam. // MKm_108 //
GR14mdhvkmou:236: tyaktvāmṛtaṃ yathā kaścid anyapānaṃ piben naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:237: tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_109 //
GR14mdhvkmou:238: svadharmaṃ tu parityajya paradharmaṃ yathā caret
GR14mdhvkmou:239: tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_110 //
GR14mdhvkmou:240: gāṃ ca tyaktvā vimūḍhātmā gardabhīṃ vandate yathā
GR14mdhvkmou:241: tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_111 //
GR14mdhvkmou:243: tṛṣito jāhnavītīre kūpaṃ khanati durmatiḥ. // MKm_112 //
GR14mdhvkmou:244: yathā gaṅgodakaṃ tyaktvā pibet kūpodakaṃ naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:245: tathā hariṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_113 //
GR14mdhvkmou:247: tathā hariṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate. // MKm_114 //
GR14mdhvkmou:248: yāvat svastham idaṃ piṇḍaṃ nirujaṃ karaṇānvitam
GR14mdhvkmou:249: tāvat kuruṣvā 'tmahitaṃ paścāt tāpena tapyase. // MKm_115 //
GR14mdhvkmou:250: yāvat svāsthyaṃ śarīreṣu karaṇeṣu ca pāṭavam
GR14mdhvkmou:251: tāvad arcaya govindam āyuśyaṃ sārthakaṃ kuru. // MKm_116 //
GR14mdhvkmou:252: smaryatāṃ tu hṛṣīkeśo hṛṣīkeṣu dṛḍheṣu ca
GR14mdhvkmou:253: adṛḍheṣu hṛṣīkeṣu hṛṣīkeśaṃ smaranti ke. // MKm_117 //
GR14mdhvkmou:255: tāvac cet smarate viṣṇuṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt. // MKm_118 //
GR14mdhvkmou:257: tāvac cet smarate viṣṇuṃ ko na mucyeta bandhanāt. // MKm_119 //
GR14mdhvkmou:259: jñātvā viprās tithiṃ samyag daivajñaiḥ samudīritām
GR14mdhvkmou:260: kartavya upavāsaś ca anyathā narakaṃ vrajet. // MKm_120 //
GR14mdhvkmou:261: kṣaye vā 'py athavā vṛddhau samprāpte vā dinakṣaye
GR14mdhvkmou:262: upoṣyā dvādaśī puṇyā pūrvaviddhāṃ parityajet. // MKm_121 //
GR14mdhvkmou:264: saṃtates tu vināśāya sampado haraṇāya ca. // MKm_122 //
GR14mdhvkmou:266: surāyā bindunā spṛṣṭaṃ gaṅgāmbha iva santyajet. // MKm_123 //
GR14mdhvkmou:267: śvadṛtau pañcagavyaṃ ca daśamyā dūṣitāṃ tyajet
GR14mdhvkmou:268: ekādaśīṃ dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_124 //
GR14mdhvkmou:269: tasmād viprā na viddhā hi kartavyaikādasī kvacit
GR14mdhvkmou:270: viddhā hanti purāpuṇyaṃ śrāddhaṃ ca vṛṣalīpatiḥ. // MKm_125 //
GR14mdhvkmou:271: japtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ snātaṃ tathā pūjā kṛtā hareḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:272: tat sarvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti tamaḥ sūryodaye yathā. // MKm_126 //
GR14mdhvkmou:274: upoṣyā dvādaśī tatra trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇam. // MKm_127 //
GR14mdhvkmou:285: udayāt prāk trighaṭikā vyāpiny ekādaśī yadā
GR14mdhvkmou:288: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇaṃ. // MKm_134 //
GR14mdhvkmou:292: tatra kratuśataṃ puṇyaṃ trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṇam. // MKm_136 //
GR14mdhvkmou:294: tasyāḥ putraśataṃ naṣṭaṃ tasmāt tāṃ parivarjayet. // MKm_137 //
GR14mdhvkmou:296: upoṣyā dvādaśī puṇyā trayodaśyāṃ tu pāraṅam. // MKm_138 //
GR14mdhvkmou:297: ekādaśyāṃ tu viddhāyāṃ samprāpte śravaṇe tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:298: upoṣyā dvādaśī puṇyā pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_139 //
GR14mdhvkmou:300: amālakṣaṃ tu dvādaśyāḥ kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm. // MKm_140 //
GR14mdhvkmou:301: śuddhāpi dvādaśī grāhyā parato dvādaśī yadi
GR14mdhvkmou:302: viṣaṃ tu daśamī jñeyā 'mṛtaṃ caikādaśī tithiḥ.
GR14mdhvkmou:303: viṣapradhānā varjyā sā 'mṛtā grāhyā pradhānataḥ. // MKm_141 //
GR14mdhvkmou:305: yaḥ kuryān mandabuddhitvān nirayaṃ so 'dhigacchati. // MKm_142 //
GR14mdhvkmou:306: yāni kāni ca vākyāni viddhopāsyāparāṇi tu
GR14mdhvkmou:307: dhanadārcāparāṇi syur vaiṣṇavī na daśāyutā. // MKm_143 //
GR14mdhvkmou:309: arthitaḥ kārayām āsa vyāsarūpī janārdanaḥ. // MKm_144 //
GR14mdhvkmou:315: tataḥ koṭiguṇaṃ vā 'pi niṣiddhasyetarair janaiḥ. // MKm_146 //
GR14mdhvkmou:316: yad anādikṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tad ūrdhvaṃ yat kariṣyati
GR14mdhvkmou:317: tat sarvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti pareṣām upavāsanāt
GR14mdhvkmou:318: na ca tasmāt priyatamaḥ keśavasya mamāpi vā. // MKm_147 //
GR14mdhvkmou:319: ekādaśyā hy avedhe tu dvādaśīṃ na parityajet
GR14mdhvkmou:320: pāraṇe maraṇe caiva tithis tātkālikī smṛtā. // MKm_148 //
GR14mdhvkmou:321: brahmacārī gṛhastho vā vānaprastho yatis tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:322: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro bhartṛmatī tathā. // MKm_149 //
GR14mdhvkmou:324: ekādaśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_150 //
GR14mdhvkmou:326: śuklāyām atha kṛṣṇāyāṃ nirayaṃ yāti sa dhruvam. // MKm_151 //
GR14mdhvkmou:327: vivecayati yo mohāc chuklā kṛṣṇeti pāpakṛt
GR14mdhvkmou:328: ekādaśīṃ sa vai yāti nirayaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_152 //
GR14mdhvkmou:329: yathā gaur naiva hantavyā śuklā kṛṣṇeti bhāmini
GR14mdhvkmou:330: ekadāśyāṃ na bhuñjīta pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_153 //
GR14mdhvkmou:334: prīṇanārthaṃ harer nityaṃ na tu kāmavyapekṣayā. // MKm_155 //
GR14mdhvkmou:335: tasmāc chuklām atho kṛṣṇāṃ bharaṇyādiyutām api
GR14mdhvkmou:337: prīṇanārthaṃ hareś vāpi viṣṇulokasya cā 'ptaye. // MKm_156 //
GR14mdhvkmou:338: kalā vā ghaṭikā vā 'pi apare dvādaśī yadi
GR14mdhvkmou:339: dvādaśadvādaśīr hanti pūrvedyuḥ pāraṇe kṛte. // MKm_157 //
GR14mdhvkmou:340: atiriktā dvādaśī cet sa tāṃ nopoṣayed yadi
GR14mdhvkmou:343: dvādaśadvādaśīr hanti dvādaśīṃ na parityajet. // MKm_159 //
GR14mdhvkmou:347: na tatra vidhilopaḥ syād ubhayor devatā hariḥ. // MKm_161 //
GR14mdhvkmou:351: na kāśī na gayā gaṅgā na reva na ca gautamī
GR14mdhvkmou:352: na cāpi kauravaṃ kṣetraṃ samā bhūpa harer dināt. // MKm_163 //
GR14mdhvkmou:357: nedṛśaṃ pāvanaṃ kiñcin narāṇāṃ bhuvi vidyate
GR14mdhvkmou:360: yāvan nopoṣayej jantuḥ padmanābhadinaṃ śivam. // MKm_167 //
GR14mdhvkmou:361: ekādaśendriyaiḥ pāpaṃ yat kṛtaṃ bhavati prabho
GR14mdhvkmou:362: ekādaśyupavāsena tat sarvaṃ vilayaṃ nayet. // MKm_168 //
GR14mdhvkmou:364: vyājenāpi kṛtā rājan na darśayati bhāskarim. // MKm_169 //
GR14mdhvkmou:366: sa brahmahā sa goghnaś ca stenaḥ sa gurutalpagaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:367: ekādaśyāṃ tu bhuñjānaḥ pakṣayor ubhayor api. // MKm_170 //
GR14mdhvkmou:369: varaṃ hatyā surāpānam ekādaśyāṃ tu bhojanāt. // MKm_171 //
GR14mdhvkmou:371: avalokya mukhaṃ teṣām ādityam avalokayet. // MKm_172 //
GR14mdhvkmou:373: annam āśritya tiṣṭhanti samprāpte harivāsare. // MKm_173 //
GR14mdhvkmou:375: aṣṭavarṣādhiko yas tu aśītir na hi pūryate
GR14mdhvkmou:376: yo bhuṅkte mānavaḥ pāpo viṣṇor ahani cāgate. // MKm_174 //
GR14mdhvkmou:377: pitā vā yadi vā putro bhāryā vā 'pi suhṛjjanaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:378: padmanābhadine bhuṅkte nigrāhyo dasyuvad bhavet. // MKm_175 //
GR14mdhvkmou:388: na paśyati yamaṃ vā 'pi narakān na ca yātanām. // MKm_179 //
GR14mdhvkmou:390: na bhoktavyaṃ na bhoktavyaṃ samprāpte harivāsare. // MKm_180 //
GR14mdhvkmou:391: dvādaśī na pramoktavyā yāvad āyuḥ pravartate
GR14mdhvkmou:393: bhaktyā grāhyo hṛṣīkeśo na dhanair dharaṇīsurāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:394: bhaktyā sampūjito viṣṇuḥ phalaṃ datte samīhitam. // MKm_182 //
GR14mdhvkmou:396: paritoṣaṃ prayāty āśu tṛṣārtās tu yathā jalaiḥ. // MKm_183 //
GR14mdhvkmou:398: ramasva puṇḍarīkākṣa hṛdaye mama sarvadā. // MKm_184 //
GR14mdhvkmou:400: ramasva puṇḍarīkākṣa nṛsiṃha hṛdaye mama. // MKm_185 //
GR14mdhvkmou:402: bhavapaṅkārṇave ghore majjato mama sarvadā. // MKm_186 //
GR14mdhvkmou:405: etat puṇyaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ pavitraṃ pāpanāśanam
GR14mdhvkmou:406: āyuṣyaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ ca kaliduḥsvapnanāśanam. // MKm_188 //
GR14mdhvkmou:408: smṛte manasi govinde dahyate tūlarāśivat. // MKm_189 //
GR14mdhvkmou:409: kalau keśavabhaktānāṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit
GR14mdhvkmou:410: smṛte saṃkīrtite dhyāte saṃkṣayaṃ yāti pātakam. // MKm_190 //
GR14mdhvkmou:412: bhaktebhyaś ca pradātavyaṃ dhārmikebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ. // MKm_191 //
GR14mdhvkmou:413: adhīyāna idaṃ śāstram viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
GR14mdhvkmou:415: śrutvā dharmaṃ vijānāti śrutvā tyajati durmatim
GR14mdhvkmou:416: śrutvā jñānam avāpnoti śrutvā mokṣaṃ ca gacchati. // MKm_193 //
GR14mdhvkmou:417: tasmād idaṃ samāśrāvyaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca sadaiva hi
GR14mdhvkmou:422: tīrthakoṭisahasrais tu snāto bhavati pratyaham. // MKm_196 //
GR14mdhvkmou:424: toyaṃ yadi piben nityaṃ sāḷagrāmaśilācyutam. // MKm_197 //
GR14mdhvkmou:426: vāñchanti karasaṃsparśaṃ teṣāṃ devāḥ savāsavāḥ. // MKm_198 //
GR14mdhvkmou:430: smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ viṣṇoḥ sadaiva na parityajet. // MKm_200 //
GR14mdhvkmou:433: naśyanti sakalā rogāḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham. // MKm_201 //
GR14mdhvkmou:434: sakṛd uccāritaṃ yena harir ity akṣaradvayam
GR14mdhvkmou:435: baddhaḥ parikaras tena mokṣāya gamanaṃ prati. // MKm_202 //
GR14mdhvkmou:436: evaṃ brahmādayo devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:437: kīrtayanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum. // MKm_203 //
GR14mdhvkmou:438: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:439: yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam ananyadhīḥ. // MKm_204 //
GR14mdhvkmou:440: nityotsavo nityatā ca nityaśrīr nityaśo jayaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:441: yeṣāṃ hṛdistho bhagavān maṅgalāyatano hariḥ. // MKm_205 //
GR14mdhvkmou:442: jīvaṃś caturdaśād ūrdhvaṃ puruṣo niyamena tu
GR14mdhvkmou:443: strī vā 'py anūnadaśakaṃ dehaṃ mānuṣam ārjate. // MKm_206 //
GR14mdhvkmou:445: ato 'vittvā paraṃ devaṃ mokṣāśā kā mahāmune. // MKm_207 //
GR14mdhvkmou:448: ataḥ karmakṣayān muktiḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati. // MKm_208 //
GR14mdhvkmou:449: samānāṃ viṣamā pūjā viṣamāṇāṃ samā tathā
GR14mdhvkmou:450: kriyate yena devo 'pi svapadād bhraśyate hi saḥ. // MKm_209 //
GR14mdhvkmou:451: vittaṃ bandhur vayaḥ karma vidyā caiva tu pañcamī
GR14mdhvkmou:452: etāni mānyasthānāni garīyo yad yad uttaram. // MKm_210 //
GR14mdhvkmou:453: guṇānusāriṇīṃ pūjāṃ samāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ ca yo naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:454: sarvabhūteṣu kurute tasya viṣṇuḥ prasīdati. // MKm_211 //
GR14mdhvkmou:456: tathā karoti pūjādi samabuddhiḥ sa ucyate. // MKm_212 //
GR14mdhvkmou:457: tiryakpuṇḍraṃ na kurvīta samprāpte maraṇe 'pi ca
GR14mdhvkmou:458: na cānyan nāma vibrūyāt paraṃ nārāyaṇādṛte. // MKm_213 //
GR14mdhvkmou:459: naivedyaśeṣaṃ devasya yo bhunakti dine dine
GR14mdhvkmou:460: sikthe sikthe bhavet puṇyaṃ cāndrāyaṇaśatādhikam. // MKm_214 //
GR14mdhvkmou:462: sa caṇḍālo 'pi śuddhātmā pūjya eva na saṃśayaḥ. // MKm_215 //
GR14mdhvkmou:463: aśucir vā 'py anācāro manasā pāpam ācaran
GR14mdhvkmou:464: śucir eva bhaven nityam ūrdhvapuṇḍrānkito naraḥ. // MKm_216 //
GR14mdhvkmou:466: avalokya mukhaṃ teṣām ādityam avalokayet. // MKm_217 //
GR14mdhvkmou:467: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva svādhyāyaḥ pitṛtarpaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:468: vyarthaṃ bhavati tat sarvam ūrdhvapuṇḍraṃ vinā kṛtam. // MKm_218 //
GR14mdhvkmou:470: taṃ taṃ śuddhaṃ vijānīyān nātra kāryā vicāraṇā. // MKm_219 //
GR14mdhvkmou:472: vaiṣṇavo 'smatkule jātaḥ sa naḥ santārayiṣyati. // MKm_220 //
GR14mdhvkmou:474: na tu kalpasahasrais tu bhaktihīnasya keśave. // MKm_221 //
GR14mdhvkmou:476: yo jāto nārcayed viṣṇuṃ na smaren nāpi kīrtayet. // MKm_222 //
GR14mdhvkmou:478: api sarṣapamātreṇa punāty āsaptamaṃ kulam. // MKm_223 //
GR14mdhvkmou:482: etādṛśo 'pi nā 'cāraṃ śrautaṃ smārtaṃ parityajet. // MKm_225 //
GR14mdhvkmou:485: kurvan eveha karmāṇi jijīviṣec chataṃ samāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:486: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare. // MKm_227 //
GR14mdhvkmou:487: ācāraś caiva sādhūnām ātmanas tuṣṭir eva ca
GR14mdhvkmou:488: vedapraṇihito dharmo hy adharmas tadviparyayaḥ. // MKm_228 //
GR14mdhvkmou:489: niṣkāmaṃ jñānapūrvaṃ tu nivṛttam iha cocyate
GR14mdhvkmou:490: nivṛttaṃ sevamānas tu brahmābhyeti sanātanam. // MKm_229 //
